"A.P.242/2/11 10:30": "Alright, how should we go about dishing out the work, now that we know all of that?"
"We're completely in the dark about their battle capabilities, but the biggest issue is Shiva."
"Our power is derived from Photons. Honestly, we have no way around their ability to absorb them."
"Regarding that, we've already performed some analyses and begun countermeasures. General Affairs, your report."
"Hmm? Did you figure something out?"
"If Photons won't work, we'll hit them with physical armaments."

"We're in the final stages of our A.I.S.
adjustments. Mass-production should start soon, too."
"The Research Division is pulling out all the stops to get them ready in time for the next battle."
"With that out of the way, our next issue is the enemy's movements..."
"Unfortunately, we have no solid leads. Even coordinating our investigations with Xiao has not brought us any closer to being able to ascertain their location."
"I expect this is purely from our gap in technological abilities. Photon concealment and isolation were one of their specialties."
"Which means it will be difficult to predict when they'll appear... We'll have to constantly be on alert."
"Mm. The Instruction and Combat Sectors will work together to strengthen our mobilization readiness."

"There are a lot more ARKS than there used to
be. We should be able to double up our duties."
"So we'll have all of ARKS united in its movements."
"Um... There's something that's been bothering me."

"Shiva called <%me> the
\"vessel of the world\"."
"What exactly does that mean?"
"I am sorry, but not even I know the meaning behind those words."
"Still, she is targeting the Guardian for one reason or another. I believe we can say that with confidence."
"...We don't know her reason, but we can't just ignore it."
"<%me>. You'll be deployed with Matoi for a time. If the two of you are together, you should be safe."
"Every sector's gonna need to get nice and chummy with each other. And we're gonna need to step up our decision-making. We'll be fine as long as everyone works together."
"Ah, <%me>. Could you wait a sec?"

"It's about the A.I.S. remodel we mentioned
earlier. The person in charge of the project said they wanted to meet with you."
"Sorry to ask, but could you find some time to go meet them? I'm counting on you."
